page.title: 20CLUBS AND AMENITIES
page.content: CLUBS AND AMENITIES There is quite a wide range of community activities in the area. These are based around the community buildings, the church rooms, the school, both of which are in Tibberton and the village hall. These activities include the Womens Institute, a Keep-Fit club, Cubs, Brownies, Scouts, a Play Group, Sunday School which is held every other Sunday morning and there is a local Football Pitch and a Tennis Club which can be used by the community. Anybody needing a Doctor or Dentist has to travel to either Newent of Gloucester. For a hospital the nearest with a casualty unit is Gloucestershire Royal Hospital in Gloucester. Any of the emergency services will have to travel into the area from either Newent of Gloucester.
